column1: Insertion of sensitive information into log files
column2: Writing sensitive information to log files can allow that information to be leaked to an attacker more easily.
column4: This [["potentially sensitive information"|"relative:///service/src/main/java/uk/gov/mca/beacons/api/configuration/MicrosoftGraphConfiguration.java:26:12:26:23"]] is written to a log file.
